text: The Scarlet Dove () is a 1961 Finnish thriller movie directed by Matti Kassila and starring Tauno Palo, Matti Oravisto, Paavo Hukkinen, Tauno Söder, Risto Mäkelä, Pertti Palo, Anton Soini, Martta Kinnunen. ==Other websites== * Category:1961 thriller movies Category:Finnish movies Category:Movies directed by Matti Kassila
title: The Scarlet Dove
